input.sentences: discussion group for witnesses of horrific crime.this allows them to talk openly and deal with the issues they experience within their daily lives .
[female] was stand offish and still reluctant to speak of what she witnessed.sometimes after a couple visits they open up .
[male] still quite emotional | but is dealing with it very well.mostly because he can open up more and express himself freely within the group .
the people in the back just like [female] are still unsure.maybe willing to open up later in other meetings.sometimes takes time .
progress would never have happened for these guys if it were n't for this group .
output.sentences: ONE MAN FREELY SPOKE ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED
SOME PEOPLE UST SAT AND LISTENED
THEY GOT ALL THE INFORMATION THAT THEY NEEDED
